siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Good news - No bad reviews on Reddit yet! Why did we skip trick or treating to go to a church service? We talk through some reasons in this episode. The big reason ends up being the hymns. (You might even catch Jon singing.) Bottom line is good hymns trump candyâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Episode 16 - The Best Podcast you Probably Won't Listen To
